title: Bug 108822: More efficient logic needed for disk sorting when there are border values for row values
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Sort 40000 rows of data on disk
2. Set the program to process the data less than 40000
3. The program saves the file as a temporary file
4. The program calls the file to memory
5. Sorts the data
6. Saves the file as a temporary file again
